title: The Infinity of Infinite Self
description: Humans are truly quite unique creatures of all creatures on planet earth; through out time/space and mass/matter in the 3-D third dimension. They have created the behavioral pattern of the history of histories through Love Or Fear, Knowing Or Intelligence, and A Seed Of Inner Self, which births the energy in and of recycling infinite self. The infinity of infinite self is the perceptional holographic essence of energy that is and will always be energy.Juanita Lewis, D.Div. PhD., is a Metaphysical practitioner and a Reiki practitioner. She has natural in sites into seeing peopleâ€™s energy that is a natural born talent. Through education, knowledge, and experiments she has been able to present a different perception what our purpose is and why we are here as human beings.Join us for an inspirational journey into the metaphysical, as we learn to heal ourselves by reconnecting mind, body, emotion and spirit into 1 love - self love.
author: Juanita Lewis
